newsitem.title: UK: Japanese stocks in London static, trade light.
newsitem.headline: Japanese stocks in London static, trade light.

text.p: Japanese shares were little changed from Tokyo's closing levels in dull European trade on Monday as many investors stayed away due to a scarcity of fresh market news, dealers said.
"It's very, very quiet. There is nothing going on," one dealer said. "I've only done a couple of bargains all day."
"It was a slow day in Tokyo and we just couldn't get any interest here."
In Tokyo on Monday, the Nikkei 225-share index lost 127.87 points to close at 18,429.13.
